Articles.Content:
I have been addicted to this game letely, and I am have mostly been making mini space planes. I made a TINY Vtol that flies VERY well, takes off perfectly (Leans bearly to the front to get momentom), and is made up of only 9 parts. Just make sure you turn on your precision controlls because of its size.

Here is the link to the ship: http://www./?qdf0m4gnqdqc3xq

[ATTACH=CONFIG]33984[/ATTACH][ATTACH=CONFIG]33985[/ATTACH][ATTACH=CONFIG]33986[/ATTACH][ATTACH=CONFIG]33987[/ATTACH][ATTACH=CONFIG]33988[/ATTACH]

Hate to burst your bubble, but the screens make me think that that is a vto only, having no landing gear.

Other than that, nice little plane.
That and the take of thrusters are use once only. So strictly speaking it's VTOPGYDHTL (Vertical Take Off and Pray to God You Don't Have To Land.)
